snippet: Agron Hasbajrami, who was arrested in September as he was boarding a plane to Turkey, admitted providing money to a Pakistani terrorist group that he was planning to join.
abstract: Agron Hasbajrami, Albanian citizen living legally in New York City, pleads guilty in Federal District Court in Brooklyn to one count of attempting to provide material support to terrorists.
lead_paragraph: Agron Hasbajrami, who was arrested in September as he was boarding a plane to Turkey, admitted providing money to a Pakistani terrorist group that he was planning to join.

headline.seo: Would-Be Terrorist Pleads Guilty in Brooklyn
headline.main: In Brooklyn, a Guilty Plea to Aiding Terror
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, a Guilty Plea to Aiding Terror
